response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. For this exceptional opportunity, I am extending an offer to purchase the product for $12,000. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 12000}
